Hehehe. You guessed my plan! I was gonna draw everyone's attention
away from all the top secret stuff that's going on in the RPG by
making them fill in their char profiles! No, just kidding. It was a
pure accident.


AAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Ok, more
bad news. The message board has just been accidently cleared. I really
thiink I should knock myself out or something before I accidently
destroy something here! I'm very sorry about this too, guys.

> Grrrrrrrrrrrr, Yan I will kill you :P
>
